SEARCH

Package pdf.concat.menu

package pdf.concat.menu
Contains the classes for the menu of the PDF Concatenator. The menu is the GUI that the user interacts with to concatenate PDFs. It allows the user to choose multiple PDFs, a location and a name for the concatenated PDF. It also allows the user to go back to the main menu. The menu has a title, a warning label, a finish label, a back button, a wrong label, a text field, a wrong warning label, a concatenate button, an add button, two input choosers and a folder chooser. The menu has a main menu object to go back to the main menu. The menu has a list of input choosers to allow the user to choose multiple PDFs. The menu has a boolean to show the wrong warning label. The menu has a method to set the main menu object. The menu has a constructor to create the menu. The menu has a method to set the visibility of the menu. The menu has a method to concatenate the PDFs. The menu has a method to go back to the main menu. The menu has a method to add an input chooser. The menu has a method to check the type of the PDFs. The menu has a method to change the colors of the fields. Here are the classes of the menu:
  • AbstractMenu
  • MainMenu
  • MultiConcatMenu
  • MultiReverseMenu
  • MergeMenu
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    pdf.concat
    This package contains the classes that are used to concatenate multiple PDF files into a single PDF file.
    pdf.concat.function
    This package contains the classes that are used to concatenate, reverse and merge the PDF files.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractMenu
    Abstract class that contains methods that are used in all menu classes.
    Interactable
    Interface for all interactable objects.
    MainMenu
    MainMenu class is the main menu for the PDF concatenation program.
    MergeMenu
    MergeMenu class is a class that extends AbstractMenu and implements Interactable.
    MultiConcatMenu
    A class that represents the menu for concatenating multiple pdfs.
    MultiReverseMenu
    A class that represents the menu for reversing the order of pages for multiple pdfs.
